commit.message:
chi2_quality.cc: Use C++0x mode on simulators.

2011-02-28  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>

	* testsuite/20_util/hash/chi2_quality.cc: Use C++0x mode on simulators.
	* testsuite/20_util/hash/quality.cc: Same.

From-SVN: r170584
